org.kepler.stratosphere.stub

Class ScriptEngineReduceStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.AbstractFunction
      • eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.functions.ReduceFunction
        • org.kepler.stratosphere.stub.ScriptEngineReduceStub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.Function, eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.GenericReducer<eu.stratosphere.types.Record,eu.stratosphere.types.Record>

    public class ScriptEngineReduceStub
extends eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.functions.ReduceFunction
    A Stratosphere Reduce stub that executes a ScriptEngine. The engine is loaded in configure(), and the reduce() function invoked each time this class's reduce() is called.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
